name: d12 Common Background Odors in CY

entries.tableItem: Heavy ammonia with some aromas of sewage
The smell of decay from a nearby pile of corpses in a designated trash area
Rotted cords and burnt rubber no longer covering exposed wires.
The stench of iron and plastic lingering after a particular nasty gang fight.
Nauseous chemical profane smell saga of cooking oil, perfume, urine cakes, and artificial lemon cleaning detergent coming from the ports.
Like itâ€™s about to rain (this place could use washing out) / Like it just rained (turns out wet garbage smells worse)
